summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 1, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift times, and leave status changes for correctional officers and other personnel. The document appears to be a routine administrative record from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), New York, NY
keyFacts: This is an administrative staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated August 1, 2019.
The document details shift assignments, leave statuses (sick, annual, LWOP, AWOL), and post assignments for correctional officers.
Several posts are listed, including the Special Housing Unit (SHU), Sally Port, Lobby, and Escort details, indicating standard prison operations.
The roster includes a 'Recapitulation' summary showing totals for different leave types and staff counts.
The document is dated 1/25/2019 in its footer, suggesting it was printed or finalized on that date, but pertains to the schedule for 8/1/2019.
